The sweet frangipane filling with almonds is a lovely addition and really brings these little tarts to a whole new flavor level
Shibani - Pearlsofeast

Recipe.Ingredients: extra butter melted and 1 tbsp sugar
Recipe.Directions: Preheat oven to 200C. Place the pastry on a lined oven tray to that. Cut 1 sheet into 4 squares and prick all over with a fork to stop it puffing up too much and other one I choose to have it as a round circle.
For frangipane filling, cream the butter and sugar together until light. Add egg and mix to combine. Finally add the almonds, extract to combine.
Spread the frangipane evenly into puff pastry sheets leaving 1cm from the edges. Arrange the apple slices in a pretty petal pattern.
Brush with melted butter and sprinkle with extra sugar. Bake for about 20-25 minutes till the pastry is puffed and golden around the edges. Drizzle with honey and serve with a dollop of double cream.
